name: B&W Zeppelin
specs: Technical features: Bowers & Wilkins Music App (with Deezer, Qobuz and TIDAL support), Apple AirPlay, 2© Spotify Connect, Bluetooth In, Digital Signal Processing, Dynamic EQ, Drive units: HF 2x 25mm (1”) Double dome tweeters, MF 2x 90mm (3 1⁄2”) FST midrange, LF 1x 150mm (6”) Subwoofer, Bluetooth 5.0, BT codecs: aptX™ Adaptive - AAC - SBC

name: B&W Formation Wedge
specs: Technical features: Apple® AirPlay 2® technology, Spotify® Connect, Roon Ready, Bluetooth In, Digital Signal Processing (DSP), Digital Amplifier, Dynamic EQ, 2 x 25mm (1 in) Double dome tweeter, 2 x 90 mm (3.5 in) FST midrange, 1 x 150mm (6 in) Subwoofer, Frequency: 35Hz to 28kHz, Amplifier power output: 2 x 40W (tweeter), 2 x 40W (midrange), 1 x 80W (subwoofer)

name: B&W Formation Bar
specs: Technical features: Apple® AirPlay 2® Technology, Spotify® Connect, Roon Ready, Bluetooth In, Dolby Digital, Digital Signal Processing (DSP), Digital Amplifier, Dynamic EQ, Wireless Soundbar, 3 x 25mm (1 in) Double dome tweeter, 6 x 65 mm (2.6 in) Woven glass fibre cone bass/midrange, Frequency response: 40Hz to 28kHz, Amplifier power output: 6x 40W

name: B&W Formation Duo (pair)
specs: Technical features: Apple® AirPlay 2® technology, Spotify® Connect, Roon Ready, Bluetooth In, Digital Signal Processing (DSP), Digital Amplifier, Dynamic EQ, 1x ø25mm (1 in) Carbon dome high-frequency, 1x ø165mm (6.5 in) Continuum cone bass midrange, Frequency response: 25Hz to 33kHz, Amplifier power output: 2 x 125W

name: Focal Dôme Flax
specs: Type 2-way compact sealed speaker, Drivers 4” (10cm) Flax mid-bass, 1” (25mm) Al/Mg inverted dome tweeter, Frequency response: (±3dB) 80Hz - 28kHz, Low frequency point: (-6dB) 72Hz, Sensitivity (2.83V/1m) 88dB, Nominale impedance 8 Ohms, Minimum impedance 4 Ohms, Crossover frequency 2500Hz, Recommended amplifier power 25 - 100W

name: Focal Sib Evo Dolby Atmos
specs: Type 2-way compact sealed speaker, Drivers 4” (10cm) Flax mid-bass, 1” (25mm) Al/Mg inverted dome tweeter, Frequency response (±3dB) 80Hz - 28kHz, Low frequency point (-6dB) 72Hz, Sensitivity (2.83V/1m) 88dB, Nominale impedance 8 Ohms, Minimum impedance 4 Ohms, Crossover frequency 2500Hz. Recommended amplifier power 25 - 100W

name: Focal Sub Air
specs: Flat bass-reflex subwoofer, integrated 150W BASH® amp Speaker 8”, Cut frequency (-6dB) 35Hz , Frequency response (+/- 3dB) 40Hz - 200Hz, Crossover cutoff Variable 50Hz - 200Hz, Continuous power output 110W, Peak power 150 W, Phase adjustment 0 - 180° switch, Sound Sampling 16 bits, Sampling Frequency 44.1kHz, Latency 13ms

name: Focal Universal Wireless
specs: Universal Wireless Receiver, Range 10m (line of sight), Codec: aptX, Compression Ratio 4:1, Resolution and Sampling Rate 16 bits - 44,1kHz, Frequency response 10Hz to 22kHz, Algorithmic Delay +1,89ms @ Fs 48KHz, Radio transmission power 2,5mW (4dBm), Radio transmission Frequency Range 2,4GHz (Bandes ISM), Dimensions 60x56x14mm, Weight 0.044lb (22g)
